column4: ok, i got my ubuntu install to see my windows shared files yesterday, but it stopped. and i didnt change anything. what do i need to do to get it to work?
are you using the gnome file browser (nautilus)?
find out the ip of the windows machine and go go smb://192.168.0.xx accordingly
is the firewall service running in windows (it has to be for sharing to work) start -> run -> services.msc
i dont mean "Firewall" in the control panel but the raw service
security center is the same as control panel but nevermind
Error connecting to 192.168.x.xxx (No route to host)
are you in the same ip subnets (i.e. both 192.168.0.X )
but you can ping your router?
is your windows set to automatic ip (dchp)?
have you some odd security software (symantec etc.)?
